    html vers shiny.tag

    html-vers-shiny-tag.Rmd
    library(shinygouv)

    parse_to_xml

    render_node

    parse_html 

    html_code <- '<button id="test" type="button" class="btn btn-default action-button">test</button>'
parse_html(html_code)
